text: Iris is a purpleish light shade of blue. The first use of iris as a color name in English was in 1916. The name is derived from the Iris flower. == Color codes == * Iris is hex: #5a4fcf * Iris is made of 35.3% red, 31% green and 81.2% blue * Iris's closest web safe color is #6666cc. * #5a4fcf could be obtained by mixing #b49eff with #00009f. == Related pages == * Purple * Blue * Indigo == References ==
title: Iris (color)
